Class MessageSender

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String text)
                 throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Send message to specified recipient.
        Parameters:
        email - email or recipient.
        text - text of message.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if message can't be send or connection with smtp server can't be created.
